title: Ford EVs to get access to Tesla charging network next year
description: Gaining access to 12,000 Tesla superchargers will more than double the size of the fast-charging network available to Ford electric vehicles.

title: Why Nvidia is suddenly one of the most valuable companies in the world
description: The company is now the world's sixth-most valuable firm.

title: Mark Zuckerberg unveils ‘scrappier’ future at Meta after layoffs
description: Facebook parent company Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg addressed the company’s staff on Thursday following layoffs.

title: Virgin Galactic plane reaches space with 6 employees onboard
description: The successful test flight should mean the company, founded by Richard Branson, could soon begin commercial service

title: TikTok is also making an AI chatbot, for some reason
description: The chatbot for now is available only for some TikTok users in the Philippines.

title: Tech’s ambassador to Washington gambles his career on AI
description: Microsoft president Brad Smith learned to work with D.C. Now a brewing debate over AI regulation is testing his well-worn playbook.

title: For service workers, the pandemic burnout crisis never ended
description: Workers in nursing, fast food and airlines say their jobs are only worsening as they continue struggle with low pay, burnout and staffing issues three years into the pandemic.
